review.title: “A great recruitment and placement agency”
review.pros: Pros – the company works with a select group of high-tech companies and recruits for a widevariety of positions in the fields of Research and Development, Engineering,Marketing, Operation, Finance and Human Resources.
review.cons: Cons – A small agency, it's hard to to balance work and life sometimes.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
